Housing.desc: Expenses related to housing payments, including rent or mortgage payments, property taxes, and homeowner's insurance.

Transportation.desc: Expenses related to transportation, such as fuel costs, public transit fares, vehicle maintenance, and parking fees.

Food.desc: Expenses related to food purchases, including groceries, dining out, and snacks.

Healthcare.desc: Expenses related to healthcare, including health insurance premiums, medical bills, prescriptions, and co-pays.

Utilities.desc: Expenses related to utility bills, including electricity, gas, water, internet, and phone services.

Entertainment.desc: Expenses related to entertainment, such as movie tickets, streaming subscriptions, concerts, and recreational activities.

Clothing and Personal Care.desc: Expenses related to clothing purchases, shoes, accessories, as well as personal care items like toiletries, cosmetics, and haircuts.

Debt Payments.desc: Expenses related to debt repayment, including credit card payments, loan payments, and other outstanding debts.

Savings and Investments.desc: Expenses related to savings contributions and investments, such as retirement savings, investment accounts, and contributions to savings goals.

Education.desc: Expenses related to education, including tuition fees, textbooks, school supplies, and educational resources.

Travel.desc: Expenses related to travel, such as airfare, hotel accommodations, transportation costs, and travel activities.

Donations.desc: Expenses related to charitable donations and contributions to nonprofit organizations.

Insurance.desc: Expenses related to insurance premiums, including health insurance, car insurance, home insurance, and other types of insurance coverage.

Taxes.desc: Expenses related to taxes, including income taxes, property taxes, sales taxes, and other tax liabilities.

Miscellaneous.desc: Expenses that do not fit into any specific category, including one-time purchases, unexpected expenses, and other miscellaneous costs.
